text: @SidneyPowell1 @realDonaldTrump @GenFlynn @dbongino @molmccann @BoSnerdley Mask definitely don't work..!! My mom wore her mask EVERY TIME  she went out of the house and she STILL contracted coronavirus and is very ill as I type this very Tweet. #PrayForMom🙏😭😭😭 https://t.co/UPrMWOF27O
